stripRootDir

public static java.lang.String stripRootDir(java.io.File rootFile,
                                            java.io.File file)
Makes the file name relative to the root directory by stripping the input directory prefix from the file name.

Parameters:
file - The file whose name is to be relativized.
Returns:
The relativized path.
